class.name: TabContainer
class.description: Arranges [Control] children into a tabbed view, creating a tab for each one. The active tab's corresponding [Control] has its [code]visible[/code] property set to [code]true[/code], and all other children's to [code]false[/code]. Ignores non-[Control] children. [b]Note:[/b] The drawing of the clickable tabs themselves is handled by this node. Adding [TabBar]s as children is not needed.

method.name: get_current_tab_control
method.description: Returns the child [Control] node located at the active tab index.

method.name: get_popup
method.description: Returns the [Popup] node instance if one has been set already with [method set_popup]. [b]Warning:[/b] This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [member Window.visible] property.

method.name: get_previous_tab
method.description: Returns the previously active tab index.

method.name: get_tab_control
method.description: Returns the [Control] node from the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: get_tab_disabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] is disabled.

method.name: get_tab_hidden
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] is hidden.

method.name: get_tab_icon
method.description: Returns the [Texture2D] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] or [code]null[/code] if the tab has no [Texture2D].

method.name: get_tab_idx_at_point
method.description: Returns the index of the tab at local coordinates [code]point[/code]. Returns [code]-1[/code] if the point is outside the control boundaries or if there's no tab at the queried position.

method.name: get_tab_title
method.description: Returns the title of the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code]. Tab titles default to the name of the indexed child node, but this can be overridden with [method set_tab_title].

method.name: set_popup
method.description: If set on a [Popup] node instance, a popup menu icon appears in the top-right corner of the [TabContainer]. Clicking it will expand the [Popup] node.

method.name: set_tab_disabled
method.description: If [code]disabled[/code] is [code]true[/code], disables the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code], making it non-interactable.

method.name: set_tab_hidden
method.description: If [code]hidden[/code] is [code]true[/code], hides the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code], making it disappear from the tab area.

method.name: set_tab_icon
method.description: Sets an icon for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_tab_title
method.description: Sets a title for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code]. Tab titles default to the name of the indexed child node.

method.name: set_tabs_rearrange_group
method.description: Defines rearrange group id, choose for each [TabContainer] the same value to enable tab drag between [TabContainer]. Enable drag with [member drag_to_rearrange_enabled].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], all tabs are drawn in front of the panel. If [code]false[/code], inactive tabs are drawn behind the panel.
The current tab index. When set, this index's [Control] node's [code]visible[/code] property is set to [code]true[/code] and all others are set to [code]false[/code].
If [code]true[/code], tabs can be rearranged with mouse drag.
The alignment of all tabs in the tab container. See the [enum TabAlign] constants for details.
If [code]true[/code], tabs are visible. If [code]false[/code], tabs' content and titles are hidden.
If [code]true[/code], children [Control] nodes that are hidden have their minimum size take into account in the total, instead of only the currently visible one.

signal.name: pre_popup_pressed
signal.description: Emitted when the [TabContainer]'s [Popup] button is clicked. See [method set_popup] for details.

signal.name: tab_changed
signal.description: Emitted when switching to another tab.

signal.name: tab_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is selected, even if it is the current tab.
